description.name: Electric combination pliers 160mm VDE
description.long_desc:
Professional insulated VDE 1000V combination pliers made of chrome-vanadium alloy steel (CrV), with a length of 160 mm. The ergonomic, multi-component handle provides effective insulation up to 1000V. These pliers are perfect for various tasks in low-voltage installations, excelling in cutting wires, both soft and hard.


Product features:




  • Ergonomic multi-component handle




  • Effective insulation up to 1000V




  • Designed for various tasks in low-voltage installations




  • Length: 160 mm




  • High-quality chrome-vanadium alloy steel (CrV)




Technical specifications:


Type: Combination pliers


Total length: 160 mm


Certification: VDE 1000V


Material: Chrome-Vanadium Steel (60CRV)


Hardness: 58HRC

description.name: Electric cable cutter 160mm VDE
description.long_desc:
Insulated VDE 1000V scissors with a length of 160mm for cutting AL, CU cables and wires.


Designed for copper and aluminum cables, single and multi-core, with rubber or plastic insulation. The ergonomic, multi-component handle provides effective insulation up to 1000V. They are perfect for various tasks in low-voltage installations. Thanks to the optimal lever ratio, cutting requires little force. Do not use for cutting steel wires and armored cables.


Product characteristics:



  • Maximum cutting diameter: 10 mm

  • For cutting copper and aluminum wires and cables

  • Do not use for cutting steel wires and armored cables

  • Ergonomic multi-component handle

  • Effective insulation up to 1000V

  • Scissors length: 160 mm


Technical specifications:


Intended use: for electricians


Certificate: VDE 1000V


Maximum cutting diameter: 10 mm


Total length: 160 mm


Material: Chrome-vanadium steel 60CRV


 


Check the tool on our Youtube channel:

description.name: Electric cable knife 180mm VDE
description.long_desc:
Insulated VDE 1000V knife designed for insulation stripping. The ergonomic, multi-component handle provides effective insulation up to 1000V. Perfect for various tasks in low-voltage installations. The crescent-shaped blade is made of stainless steel 3Cr13 subjected to the appropriate heat treatment to achieve optimal hardness at 55 HRC. The blade is finished with a sliding foot, facilitating insulation stripping.


Product characteristics:



  • Ergonomic multi-component handle, providing a secure grip, increasing comfort and work safety

  • Effective insulation up to 1000V

  • Total length of the knife is 180 mm

  • Crescent-shaped blade with a sliding foot

  • Made of stainless steel 3Cr13 subjected to professional heat treatment for hardness at 55 HRC

  • Includes a blade cover


Technical specifications:


Intended use: for electricians


Certificate: VDE 1000V


Total length: 180 mm


Blade material: Stainless steel 8Cr13


Hardness: 55 HRC


 


Check the tool on our Youtube channel:

description.name: TCT circular saw blade for wood 125x22x60T
description.long_desc:
Carbide-tipped wood cutting disc.


This wood cutting disc is made of high-quality steel. Designed for precise cutting of wood, chipboards, and carpentry. Ideally suited to professional carpentry, carpentry and construction works.


Product Features



  • Dial diameter: 125 mm

  • Mounting hole: 22 mm

  • Number of teeth: 60

  • Maximum speed: 12,000 rpm

description.name: Magnetic Drills Drivers Hex Socket Bit 8mm x 48mm 1/4" 5pcs.
description.long_desc:
8mm hexagonal magnetic sockets with a 1/4" handle, designed for use with screwdrivers. They have a strong magnet inside the cap that firmly holds screws, sheet metal screws, etc.


Product features:



  • made of high-quality CrV steel

  • strong magnet inside the cap

  • 5 pcs. 8x48mm hexagonal sockets with a 1/4" handle included in the set

  • intended for use with screwdrivers
description.short_desc:

description.long_desc: This tyre changing tool is widened and reinforced, which provides great leverage for tire replacement. Suitable for repairing tires of motorcycles, electric cars, bicycles, etc. For professional auto mechanics and home use.

description.name: 6pcs rasp & countersink set
description.long_desc:
Set of end mills for wood and metal. They are made of high-quality HSS high-speed steel. The set is intended for processing soft steel, aluminum, copper, bronze, brass, and wood. This type of mill is used during works such as grinding, shaping, edge processing, and edge profiling.


Product features:



  • made of high-quality HSS high-speed steel

  • suitable for metal and wood processing

  • the set includes 2 metal mills, 3 wood mills, and a counterbore
description.short_desc:

description.name: Garden hose 4 layer 1" 20m GEKO
description.long_desc:
GEKO light, durable 4-layer garden hose. Cross reinforcement made of the highest quality yarn.


Product Features



  • UV stabilized

  • Internal layer resistant to algae

  • Burst pressure 24 bar

  • Working temperature from -10 to +60°C

  • Free from Phthalates, heavy metals and harmful toxins

  • All season usage, excellent usage properties even at low temperatures

description.name: Gasoline generator 2HP 720W
description.long_desc:
Power generator with a 66cc two-stroke combustion engine with a capacity of 2 HP, which allows you to generate an instantaneous maximum power of 720W. The constant power that the generator can be loaded is 650W. The fuel tank with a capacity of 4.2 liters allows for continuous work (with an average load) for about 6 hours.


Product features:
high-quality components and materials
2 HP motor generating maximum voltage of 720W and a DC voltage of 650W
with medium load - possible work up to 6 hours on one fuel tank


1 socket 12V DC, and 1 socket 230V
manual start
quiet operation of the device is ensured by a properly selected silencer and very good shock absorption - 94dB
fuel tank of 4.2l capacity 
with an oil measuring cup in the cap of the fuel tank for making the mixture



Technical Specifications:


Maximum power: 0.72 kW


Nominal power: 0.65 kW


AVR: No. 


Sockets:



  1. 1x230V - 650 W

  2. 1x 12V DC


Engine power: 2 HP


Engine type: two-stroke


Engine capacity: 66 cc


Fuel type: fuel mixture (oil + gasoline 95)


Ignition: C.D.I 


Start-up: manual


Fuel tank: 4.2 liters
description.short_desc:
Power generator with a 66cc two-stroke combustion engine with a capacity of 2 HP, which allows you to generate an instantaneous maximum power of 720W. The constant power that the generator can be loaded is 650W. The fuel tank with a capacity of 4.2 liters allows for continuous work (with an average load) for about 6 hours.


Product features:
high-quality components and materials
2 HP motor generating maximum voltage of 720W and a DC voltage of 650W
with medium load - possible work up to 6 hours on one fuel tank


1 socket 12V DC, and 1 socket 230V
manual start
quiet operation of the device is ensured by a properly selected silencer and very good shock absorption - 94dB
fuel tank of 4.2l capacity 
with an oil measuring cup in the cap of the fuel tank for making the mixture



Technical Specifications:


Maximum power: 0.72 kW


Nominal power: 0.65 kW


AVR: No. 


Sockets:



  1. 1x230V - 650 W

  2. 1x 12V DC


Engine power: 2 HP


Engine type: two-stroke


Engine capacity: 66 cc


Fuel type: fuel mixture (oil + gasoline 95)


Ignition: C.D.I 


Start-up: manual


Fuel tank: 4.2 liters

description.name: Gasoline generator 2HP 720W
description.long_desc:
Professional power generator equipped with a two-stroke petrol engine with a capacity of 66cc and a power of 2 HP. The generator's alternator has copper windings, allowing it to generate a peak power of up to 720W. The continuous power the generator can handle is 650W. The 4.2-liter fuel tank allows for uninterrupted operation (at average load) for approximately 6 hours.


Product Characteristics:



  • Made using high-quality components and materials

  • A 2 HP engine provides a maximum power output of 720W and a continuous power of 650W

  • The alternator features copper windings

  • Under average load, the unit can operate for up to 6 hours on a single tank of fuel

  • Equipped with 1x 12V DC socket and 1x 230V socket

  • Manual start

  • Quiet operation is ensured by a well-matched muffler and very good damping - 94dB

  • 4.2-liter fuel tank

  • The fuel tank cap contains a measure for measuring oil when preparing the mixture


Technical Specification:



  • Brand: Tvardy

  • Model: FY950

  • Engine Model: 1E45F

  • Peak Power: 0.72 kW

  • Rated Power: 0.65 kW

  • AVR: No

  • Alternator Windings: Copper

  • Sockets:

  • 1x 230V – 650W

  • 1x 12V DC

  • Engine Power: 2 HP

  • Engine Type: Two-stroke

  • Engine Displacement: 66 cc

  • Fuel Type: Fuel mixture (oil + 95 gasoline)

  • Ignition: C.D.I

  • Start: Manual

  • Fuel Tank Capacity: 4.2 L


Check out the device test on YouTube!:

description.name: Gasoline generator 7HP 2,8KW
description.long_desc:
Professional power generator equipped with a petrol engine with a capacity of 212cc and a power of 7 HP. The generator's alternator has copper windings, allowing it to generate a peak power of up to 2800W. The continuous power the generator can handle is 2500W for the 400V socket and 833W for each of the 230V sockets. The automatic voltage regulator (AVR) the device is equipped with, thanks to constant monitoring and immediate correction, maintains a constant output voltage, regardless of load and operating temperature. The 15-liter fuel tank allows for uninterrupted operation (at average load) for approximately 8 hours.


Product Characteristics:



  • Made using high-quality components and materials

  • High-quality automatic voltage regulator (AVR) maintains a constant voltage level, allowing the generator to be used as an emergency power source for household appliances such as refrigerators, stoves, lighting, etc.

  • A 7 HP engine provides a maximum power output of 2800W and a continuous power of 2500W

  • The alternator features copper windings

  • Under average load, the unit can operate for 8 hours on a single tank of fuel

  • Equipped with 1x 12V DC socket, 3x 230V sockets, and 1x 400V power socket

  • Manual start assisted by an electronic ignition system

  • Quiet operation is ensured by a well-matched muffler and very good damping (95 dB at a distance of 4m)

  • 15-liter fuel tank equipped with a fuel level indicator


Technical Specification:



  • Brand: Tvardy

  • Model: FY3000

  • Engine Model: FY-170F

  • Peak Power: 2800W

  • Rated Power: 2500W

  • AVR: Yes

  • Alternator Windings: Copper

  • Sockets:

  • 3x 230V – 833W each socket

  • 1x 400V - 2500W

  • 1x 12V DC

  • Engine Power: 7 HP

  • Engine Type: four-stroke OHV

  • Engine Displacement: 212 cc

  • Fuel Type: PB Petrol / 95 or 98 gasoline

  • Oil Type: 10W40 or SAE30

  • Ignition: electronic

  • Start: manual

  • Fuel Tank Capacity: 15 L

  • Oil Tank Capacity: 0.6 L


Check out the device test on YouTube!:

description.name: Gasoline generator with electric recoil 15HP 6,6KW
description.long_desc:
Professional power generator equipped with a petrol engine with a capacity of 420cc and a power of 15 HP. The generator's alternator has copper windings, allowing it to generate a peak power of up to 6600W. The continuous power the generator can handle is 5000W for the 400V socket and 1666W for each of the 230V sockets. The automatic voltage regulator (AVR) the device is equipped with, thanks to constant monitoring and immediate correction, maintains a constant output voltage, regardless of load and operating temperature. The 25-liter fuel tank allows for uninterrupted operation (at average load) for approximately 7.5 hours.


Product Characteristics:



  • Made using high-quality components and materials

  • High-quality automatic voltage regulator (AVR) maintains a constant voltage level, allowing the generator to be used as an emergency power source for household appliances such as refrigerators, stoves, lighting, etc.

  • A 15 HP engine provides a maximum power output of 6600W and a continuous power of 5000W

  • The alternator features copper windings

  • Under average load, the unit can operate for 7.5 hours on a single tank of fuel

  • Equipped with 1x 12V DC socket, 3x 230V sockets, and 1x 400V power socket

  • Electronic start assisted by an electronic ignition system

  • Quiet operation is ensured by a well-matched muffler and very good damping (95 dB at a distance of 4m)

  • 25-liter fuel tank equipped with a fuel level indicator


Technical Specification:



  • Brand: Tvardy

  • Model: FY6500

  • Engine Model: FY-190F

  • Peak Power: 6600W

  • Rated Power: 5000W

  • AVR: Yes

  • Alternator Windings: Copper

  • Sockets:

  • 3x 230V – 1666W each socket

  • 1x 400V - 5000W

  • 1x 12V DC

  • Engine Power: 15 HP

  • Engine Type: four-stroke OHV

  • Engine Displacement: 420 cc

  • Fuel Type: PB Petrol / 95 or 98 gasoline

  • Oil Type: 10W40 or SAE30

  • Ignition: electronic

  • Start: electronic / manual

  • Fuel Tank Capacity: 25 L

  • Oil Tank Capacity: 1.1 L

  • Battery Capacity: 17 Ah

description.name: Gasoline generator with electric start 17HP 8,5KW
description.long_desc:
Professional power generator equipped with a petrol engine with a capacity of 456cc and a power of 17 HP. The generator's alternator has copper windings, allowing it to generate a peak power of up to 8500W. The continuous power the generator can handle is 7500W for the 400V socket and 2500W for each of the 230V sockets. The automatic voltage regulator (AVR) the device is equipped with, thanks to constant monitoring and immediate correction, maintains a constant output voltage, regardless of load and operating temperature. The 25-liter fuel tank allows for uninterrupted operation (at average load) for approximately 7 hours.


Product Characteristics:



  • Made using high-quality components and materials

  • High-quality automatic voltage regulator (AVR) maintains a constant voltage level, allowing the generator to be used as an emergency power source for household appliances such as refrigerators, stoves, lighting, etc.

  • A 17 HP engine provides a maximum power output of 8500W and a continuous power of 7500W

  • The alternator features copper windings

  • Under average load, the unit can operate for 7 hours on a single tank of fuel

  • Equipped with 1x 12V DC socket, 3x 230V sockets, and 1x 400V power socket

  • Electronic start assisted by an electronic ignition system

  • Quiet operation is ensured by a well-matched muffler and very good damping (95 dB at a distance of 4m)

  • 25-liter fuel tank equipped with a fuel level indicator


Technical Specification:



  • Brand: Tvardy

  • Model: FY8500

  • Engine Model: FY-192F

  • Peak Power: 8500W

  • Rated Power: 7500W

  • AVR: Yes

  • Alternator Windings: Copper

  • Sockets:

  • 3x 230V – 2500W each socket

  • 1x 400V - 7500W

  • 1x 12V DC

  • Engine Power: 17 HP

  • Engine Type: four-stroke OHV

  • Engine Displacement: 456 cc

  • Fuel Type: PB Petrol / 95 or 98 gasoline

  • Oil Type: 10W40 or SAE30

  • Ignition: electronic

  • Start: electronic / manual

  • Fuel Tank Capacity: 25 L

  • Oil Tank Capacity: 1.1 L

  • Battery Capacity: 17 Ah
